resources.string: 1- Enter the name of the mathematical term given 3.14159265
2- Which of the following can be arranged into a 5-letter English word?
3- What is 134 * 4 of the following can be arranged into a 5-letter English word?
4- How many inches are there in a foot?
5- Find the answer that best complete the analogy. Book is to Reading as Fork is to?
